name: Let's Renovate: Doggy Style!
description:
Description: 

A dog paints his dog house while its owner is away. Control the dog's flaccid neck with ragdoll physics to paint your dog house! 

Rules: 

Paint as much as you can within the time limit! 

Refill your paint brush by dipping your head into the paint bucket. 

WASD - Movement

Q & E - Rotate Dog

Arrow Keys - Neck Control

Space Bar - Mega BORK

Credits: 

Dexter André Osiander: Programming

Adrian Ihle: Programming

Ragnhild Fjærbu Bråten: 3D Modelling, 2D Art

Kaja Arielle Sommerstad Bergseth: 3D Modelling, 2D Art, Texturing

Kristiane Skogvang Kolshus: Rigging, Animation, 3D Modelling

Julie Nagell Hagen: Sound Effects

Oda Tilset: Sound Effects, Music
